name: Communication Kills
description:
Use A, D, W and  S to move, Q & E or mouse to rotate. There's a door behind you but you need to enter a secret key code to open it and win the game. Get to the phone the other side of the room to receive the clue, come back and click on the door to enter the key code. Avoid the mummies, they think like you but they're deadly. Good luck.

NB: Press BACKSPACE within the door code Input Field in order to try again if answer is wrong.

(Disclaimer: The mouse control was dodgy on the webGL build so had to reupload but still done within 3 hours)

ASSET CREDITS:
